title: Newest Trump Pardon Candidate? The Jan. 6 Pipe Bomb Suspect
description: Trump pardons drug lords and indicted lawmakers who speak ill of Joe Biden, so why not the conspiracy enthusiast Jan. 6 pipe bomb suspect?
content: Don’t say it won’t happen, folks. Just a day after the FBI announced the arrest of the infamous Jan. 6, 2021 pipe bomb suspect, who planted two explosive devices at the Democratic National Committee … [+7398 chars]
